version_description:
- We have added the German language!
- We've improved the tutorial for 3D Touch users!
- We have made your life easier by lowering the star requirement to go to Chapter 2 and Chapter 3!
- We have also corrected some of the errors that you have reported to us! Thank you for the feedback!

- New HARD MODE! Play your favorite missions and win DOUBLE PRIZE!
- We've IMPROVED the TOURNAMENT menu!
- Now your experience also improves your Combat Level! And we give you a CLASSIC CHEST FOR FREE every time you level up!
- We hace balanced some missions!
- We've fixed some minor bugs!

- We've added NEW TOURNAMENTS!
- We've improved USABILITY!
- We've extended the CAMPAIGN MODE with a lot of comics!
- We've improved STABILITY!
- We've increased the REWARD you get for each level up!
- NEW LANGUAGES have been added: French, Japanese, Russian, Italian and Portuguese!
- minor bugs

- fixed a critical bug which crashes the game
- improved stability

- ZOMBIE EVENT available! Tetracorp has invaded the city with zombie hordes. You have just 4 days to clean up the underground and build a headquarter!
- NEW GAME MODE: SKIRMISH! You have to kill the enemies before the time ends to increase your rank and to win juicy prices!
- NEW CHARACTERS like Skull, Ninja, Emily or the exclusive Forever Alone!
- NEW WEAPONS added! Try the FN-P90 or the FAMAS, unique weapons like the Dubstep and snipers like the Dragunov or the CheyTac M200!
- New SKILLS MENU: Now you can LEVEL UP FASTER! And we’ve added explicative videos. Check them out!
- Improved MISSION MENU: Speeded up LOAD TIMES and now it shows info about your progress!
- Modern SNIPER VISION: We’ve added a Visual Mark on the enemies. No place to Hide, No soldier will escape!
- You asked for it... ROBOTO SPECIAL OFFER PACK! Our killer Robot character!
- CHAPTER 6 will be soon available! And it brings: +frenetic JEEP COMBATS, +DRONE MISSIONS, +COVER FIRE action!

+ CHAPTER 6 will be soon available
+ Minor bugs fixes
+ Performance improvements

+ NEW CHAPTER: WINTER ROAD! Here is the next chapter of the main campaign, full of enemies, drones, jeeps and heavy machine guns!
+ New supply crates system! We have improve the follow up of the free crates that you are about to receive! We also improved the prices and the content.
+ Enemies improved! We are happy to show the new aspect of the Tetracorp troops, more threatening!
+ More stability and less bugs. This is always fine.

- Added Reload Button!
- New Characters!: Gorilla, Red, Anya-6 and Eyelee
- New Loading Screens!
- Improvements and minor bugs

+ New Chapter!: Cold Fortress. Combat against tetracorp on its territory, with infiltration missions, drones and... robots!
+ New shooting mode: Mech, available only on chapter 7
+ More Skirmishes missions
+ other minor bugs

- New Black Market!! Now you can buy weapons, characters, skills and other resources
- 2th event zombie!! You can play again the event zombie!! but beware, each event has its own progress.
- New Characters Cards Design!

+ New perks system. Simplified and improved to make them more powerful.
+ New Characters Cards Design!
+ New Character and new weapon: Marianne and a Crossbow!!!!
+ New Black Market design
+ Weapon statistics are now shown in the menu. Power and cadence among others.
+ Improved the chance to win character and weapon cards in the crates!
+ minor bugs

NEW CHAPTER!!
+ New Chapter 8, The Awakening. Fight against spiders, robots, and… zombies?
+ New perks system. Simplified and improved to make them more powerful.
+ Weapon statistics are now shown in the menu. Power and cadence among others.
+ Improved the chance to win character and weapon cards in the crates!
+ New Black Market design
+ New Character and new weapon available: Marianne and a Crossbow!!!!
+ Bug fixes and various technical improvements

+ Added new rewards (new weapon and character) in the weekend skirmish!
+ Removed orange currency. It will be changed by coins in the black market
+ Fixed cropped UI in some devices
+ Added loot crate info
+ Fixed gun poses in the enemy soldiers

+ Added New Sniper Event! Fight for three days as a sniper in Night Vision Spec Ops!
+ Added New Zombie Event! Play again and destroy all the zombies in the new event Zombie Revenge!
+ Now you can change the sniper zoom during the missions
+ Fixed minor bugs and optimisations

Big Update! New chapters in Single Player mode: Secret Shuttle Platform
Under the ocean platform there is a secret shuttle. Battle agains Tetracorp and try to stop the launch before the world war begins!

+ Fixed crash after the starting logo
+ New Chapter 11! Secret Platform!
Survive a chase in the middle of the ocean and assault the supply ship on its way to Tetracorp's secret platform.
Fight to the end because they will not let you on board...

+ We have added a new PERK: GRENADES! Now you can launch grenades to defeat enemies! It’s perfect with hordes of soldiers or zombies!
+ We have updated the Privacy Policy
+ More fixes and improvements
minor bugs and improvements

New Chapter 11! Secret Platform!
Survive a chase in the middle of the ocean and assault the supply ship on its way to Tetracorp's secret platform.
Fight to the end because they will not let you on board...

+ Skirmish bug fixed
+ Small chests gold probability increased
+ Added New Sniper Event! Fight for three days as a sniper in Night Vision Spec Ops!
+ Added New Zombie Event! Play again and destroy all the zombies in the new event Zombie Revenge!
+ Now you can change the sniper zoom during the missions
+ Fixed minor bugs and optimisations
+ Minor bugs and improvements
+ Minor bugs and improvements

+ fixed a rare bug with the events dates and the skirmish dates
+ mission 8-6 has been rebalanced

NEW CHAPTER!!
+ New Chapter 9 The Experiment: EvE
Discover Tetracorp's most hidden secret. Combat with this new hero and survive in the battlefield!
+ Minor bugs and improvements
+ Minor bugs and improvements

+ Splash screen issue fixed
+ Minor bugs and improvements
+ Minor bugs and improvements
+ Minor bugs and improvements

Update 1.9 is here! Thanks for your comments, support and suggestions!
+ Awesome NEW event: NIGHTMARE! Unlock it by finishing the events ‘Zombie Underground’, ’Sniper Special Ops’ and ‘Zombie Revenge’. Complete this events and win the character Marianne and the weapon Crossbow
+ Amazing new skirmish REWARDS!!: character EYELEE as assault and character ROSE as sniper
+ fixed damage from the crossbow weapon when shoot to spiders, drones and mechs
+ Performance improvements and Minor bug fixes

NEW CHAPTER!!
+ New Chapter 10: The Hangar. Help EvE to get through the Tetracorp forces, including new enemies as zombies, hostile robots, drones and skilled snipers.
+ New Boss: The Phantom. This strong and extremely fast enemy will test your combat skills. Are you ready, soldier? Go and Play Now!

+ new PRO Play Mode: Complete the missions in PRO mode and get more rewards!
+ Now you can use each perks more than once per stage!
+ Phantom Boss (Chapter 10) has been rebalanced
+ Added support for iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max

+ new PRO Play Mode: Complete the missions in PRO mode and get more rewards!
+ Now you can use each perks more than once per stage!
+ Phantom Boss (Chapter 10) has been rebalanced
+ Added support for iPhone XS and iPhone XS Max

+ New mode: Sniper Ops. We have changed old skirmish missions for this new mode. Defeat all enemies before the time runs out. Each target adds 3 seconds to survive. Remember: Complete the last tournament before update to receive the rewards.

+ New mode: Sniper Ops. We have changed old skirmish missions for this new mode. Defeat all enemies before the time runs out. Each target adds 3 seconds to survive. Remember: Complete the last tournament before update to receive the rewards.

+ Increased initial time to 20 seconds in sniper ops
+ New mode: Sniper Ops. We have changed old skirmish missions for this new mode. Defeat all enemies before the time runs out. Each target adds 3 seconds to survive. Remember: Complete the last tournament before update to receive the rewards

+ Increased initial time to 20 seconds in sniper ops
+ New mode: Sniper Ops. We have changed old skirmish missions for this new mode. Defeat all enemies before the time runs out. Each target adds 3 seconds to survive. Remember: Complete the last tournament before update to receive the rewards

+ New Jungle map for Sniper Army Series!
+ Survive and be the best sniper and unlock the new rewards!
+ Performance improvements
+ Minor bug fixes

Various bug fixes and improvements

+ New chapter 12 in Single Player mode: Secret Shuttle! Under the ocean platform there is a secret shuttle. Battle agains Tetracorp and try to stop the launch before the world war begins!
+ New Feature: Perfect bonus in new mission. Complete the new missions with a perfect and receive an extra card!
+ We have fixed the following missions: 2-12, 11-3, 7-1, 7-12, 10-1, 11-1
+ Now the grenades cause more damage to the mechs and explodes when hit with the enemy
+ Performance improvements and bug fixes

Your duty? Lead every battle! One of best shooting games on mobiles, and now play offline and online.

New Chapter XIII: Deep Space! You have fought in the jungle, in cities devastated by TetraCorp, on oil platforms in the middle of the ocean, in deserts and subway labs. Now, Thrown to the space, your objetive is to arrive at the space station of TetraCorp, hidden behind the moon, and discover the horrible secrets inside. Survive or die
